nodes.bodyText: We have this info dump because there was a problem with headers being too large (HTTP violation). Just to tell you why this was done..  We could set it to debug, ok. Especially since it's not a problem anymore.
Maybe we don't need to dump all headers even on debug level. As the most important will be in json fields (request ids and other).
Why is this method not changed like others? logger.warn(msg, e)
There is an extra space before getReqId()
